item.title: Author Logic Test Post
item.description:
This post tests the author display logic.

Scenario 1:

  • author: “Primary Author One”
  • authors: [“Primary Author One”, “Additional Author A”, “Additional Author B”]

Expected behavior:

  • Main author displayed: Primary Author One (If the template shows main author explicitly)
  • Additional authors displayed: Additional Author A, Additional Author B
  • Tags should appear once in the article meta.
